input.sentences: here we are | getting ready for our backyard fireworks show .
opps ! getting a little too close to the flame | let 's save the fireworks for later !
there we go | the beginning of the show-the kids really love this part .
sparklers for the young ones | such preety lights from them .
we saved the biggest and brightest for last !
output.sentences: Jim said he was ready to set off the fireworks in the backyard.
He got a little ahead of himself and had to save some opps from the flames.
Once he got going the kids loved the beginning of the fireworks show.
They had been playing with sparklers, which made really pretty lights, but were toast compared to the banquet in the sky.
Jim got points for saving the biggest and brightest for last.
